casebody.data:
YOUNG
v.
GREAT AMERICAN INS. CO. No. 54A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 6, 2004. Susan K. Burkhardt, Raleigh, for Great American Ins. Co. of NY. Mark Davis, Raleigh, for City of Fayetteville. William Peregoy, Wilmington, for Young.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of April 2004 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Wortham, Pechie, and Peele) shall have up to and including the 19th day of April 2004 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of April 2004."
